code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{Card,Button}from'react-bootstrap';import Rating from'./Rating';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MenuItem=_ref=>{let{menuItem}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{className:"my-3 p-3 rounded menu-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/menu/${menuItem._id}`,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Img,{src:menuItem.image_url||'/images/default-food.jpg',variant:"top",className:"menu-image"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Body,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/menu/${menuItem._id}`,style:{textDecoration:'none'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Title,{as:"div",className:"text-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:menuItem.name})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Text,{as:"div",className:"my-2 text-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Rating,{value:menuItem.rating||0,text:`${menuItem.numReviews||0} reviews`})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Text,{as:"h3",className:"text-center mb-3",children:["$",menuItem.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Text,{as:"p",className:"text-muted mb-3",children:menuItem.description.length>100?`${menuItem.description.substring(0,100)}...`:menuItem.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"d-grid gap-2",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/menu/${menuItem._id}`,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"primary",className:"btn-block",children:"View Details"})})})]})]});};export default MenuItem;
